rows.title: How much does it cost
rows.content: It varies from place to place. The average cost is approximately 2€ per day. To find out the current rate, select a charging station in the app.

rows.title: How to use it?
rows.content:
• Create an account - your phone number is required.

• Choose a convenient station on the map. We'll help you charge your phone at the mall, airport, train station and thousands of other places around the city.

• When you're there, look for a vending machine labeled PowerPowerfull!

• Follow the instructions on the machine.

• Pay your rent. Important: we have cashless payment only.

• Done! You can take the powerbank.

• You can return the powerbank to the nearest station - you can find it on the map. We will only show you the vending machines where you can return the charge.

rows.title: What cables are included?
rows.content: Type-C, micro-USB, Lightning for iPhone. Connect any cable of your choice - they are built into the powerbank.

rows.title: How safe is a powerbank?
rows.content: Completely safe - just like a normal charger. Our powerbanks are manufactured in compliance with all international standards, Apple and EAC certification.

rows.title: How do I return a powerbank to the machine?
rows.content:
1. Find a return machine in the app - we'll show you the nearest one on the map.

2. Make sure the wire from the powerbank is plugged back into the socket.

3. The powerbank should be inserted into the cell with the side where the wires are attached.

4.Make sure the powerbank is fully inserted: gently pull it toward you. If it doesn't come out of the cell, then it's done.

5. Check the app: you'll get a message that the powerbank was successfully returned.

If something went wrong during the return, contact our support team. The phone number is 0 950 402-274, there is a chat in Telegram.

rows.title: The machine is full of cells and I can't dump the charge. What do I do?
rows.content:
Most importantly: do not leave your powerbank with other people, even if it's a waiter. The same person who rented it must return the powerbank.

Check the map of charging stations in the app to find the nearest place where you can charge it.

The phone number is 0 950 402-274, there is a chat in Telegram.
